column2: "I'm really sorry about this. I hate havin' to rely on you to bail me out all the time, killer."
"But I've never encountered anything like that monster before. You can understand me bein' cautious, right?"
"But hey, I don't want to see you gettin' hurt on my account either. Keep your cool out there, okay killer?"
"I'll be watchin' through the monitor like usual. No goin' overboard now!"
